definition: to mix/to mingle/muddled/to drift along/to muddle along/to pass for/to get along with sb/thoughtless/reckless
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs

sentences.english: Press mixture into bottom and 1 inch up sides of prepared pan.
sentences.chinese: 將混和物鋪在烤盤底部和四邊，每邊約1寸高。

sentences.english: The performance change of core-spun yarn and blended yarn after alkali treatment were compared.
sentences.chinese: 對比分析了鹼處理後包芯紗和混和紗性能的變化。

sentences.english: Soon she was being instructed how to mix and use colors and shape small plasticine models.
sentences.chinese: 很快有人指導她學會混和用色來捏小橡皮泥模型。

sentences.english: Rolled fish Fish mixed with dry salt before further handling and cure operations.
sentences.chinese: 魚捲在進一步處理與加工行動前所混和著乾鹽的魚。

sentences.english: Concrete is made of cement, sand, and gravel mixed with water.
sentences.chinese: 沙，石子和水泥混和成混凝土。

definition: milling/to grind/to polish by grinding/to abrade/whetstone/pestle
